articles.title: Voting guide: Here’s what voters need to know before Boston’s Tuesday election
articles.description:
Polls across the city will be open between 7 a.m. and 8 p.m. in the city's 275 voting precincts. While Mayor Michelle Wu is running unopposed, most of the City Council races are contested.

The post Voting guide: Here’s what voters need to know before Boston’s Tuesday election appeared first on Boston.com.
